header.topics: Discussing students, politics, student loans, pensions, MOT, working abroad, Netflix, consent, agreeing where to drive.
header.activity: Two friends talking about various topics (see 9 above) in a bistro in Tarnow, Poland.

speaker.occupation: unemployed/ Some part-time private TEFL teacher/ Semi-retired
Teacher of English as a foreign Language
